name: Philly Cheeseburger Skillet Dinner
ingredients: 1 green pepper, cut in strips, about 5 ounces
1 red pepper, cut in strips, about 5 ounces
4 ounces American cheese, cut up, 6 slices

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with onion in a large skillet or wok; drain grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso s cibuľou na veľkej panvici alebo woku; zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンまたは中華鍋で挽肉と玉ねぎを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Add mushrooms, green pepper, and garlic. Stir-fry until peppers are tender-crisp, seasoning with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Pridajte huby, zelenú papriku a cesnak. Opekajte, kým papriky nezmäknú, ale zostanú chrumkavé, ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: マッシュルーム、ピーマン、ニンニクを加えます。ピーマンがやわらかくなるまで炒め、塩コショウで味付けします。

instructions.en: Stir in cheese and cook over low heat until melted.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte syr a varte na miernom ohni, kým sa neroztopí.
instructions.ja: チーズを加えて混ぜ、弱火で溶けるまで調理します。
